Title: The Experiment
Writer: Paul T. Scheuring (screenplay), Mario Giordano (novel), Mario Giordano (film "Das Experiment"), Christoph Darnst√§dt (film "Das Experiment"), Don Bohlinger (film "Das Experiment"), Oliver Hirschbiegel (film "Das Experiment")
